duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing one or more handscoring contracts and actively participating in scheduling, resource planning, and developing item-specific training.

Coordinating with program and project managers to ensure readiness for active scoring, managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and performing post-project work and data analysis.
Applying thorough knowledge of science topics used for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science and an understanding of state and national science standards.
Clear communication to various roles daily, including communication via chat, email, phone, posted reports, and videoconference meetings.
Mentoring and training Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and training Science and potentially Math items to a large and varied scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred, additional Math college courses are preferred.
